DESCRIPTION: Activate #yConvolution and all #yAttention #yHead s' effects in discard pile.
During #yForward #yPropagation, play a #yFeature #yMap with attacks and blocks, whose values are equal to the convolution of all card values in the discard pile multiplied by the #yAP.
Current loss of the model. Reducing the stacks of #rLoss is beneficial for improving the #yAP .
The current model's adaptability to unseen datasets. Excessive #rOverfitting stacks will reduce the #yAP .
It is related to the #yLoss and #rOverfitting stacks, which affect the effectiveness of #yForward #yPropagation .
